name: Search by Position in User Lists

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. In Profile > Profile Settings > Position, add a position to two test accounts and Save.
2. Search for the test accounts, by POSITION, in the following lists:
  • Sidebar Menu > View/Manage Members
  • Channel drop down menu > Add Members
  • Channel drop down menu > View/Manage Members
  • "More..." at the bottom of your direct message list
inline.expectedResult: Results are displayed for the users based on "Position" field info

customFields.Important notes about this step: Searching for users by position shouldn't work on the message autocomplete or on the search :from modifier, since it's not visible on the UI.
